signatures.text: fun CharSequence.replaceRange( startIndex: Int, endIndex: Int, replacement: CharSequence): CharSequence
signatures.desc: Returns a char sequence with content of this char sequence where its part at the given range is replaced with the replacement char sequence.

signatures.text: fun String.replaceRange( startIndex: Int, endIndex: Int, replacement: CharSequence): String
signatures.desc: Replaces the part of the string at the given range with the replacement char sequence.

signatures.text: fun CharSequence.replaceRange( range: IntRange, replacement: CharSequence): CharSequence
signatures.desc: Returns a char sequence with content of this char sequence where its part at the given range is replaced with the replacement char sequence.

signatures.text: fun String.replaceRange( range: IntRange, replacement: CharSequence): String
signatures.desc: Replace the part of string at the given range with the replacement string.
